short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your habit streaks right in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your habits and activities like never before with the Activity Streak Tracker Chrome extension! This powerful tool opens in a new tab, providing a vibrant heatmap that visually represents your activity streaks.

Key Features:

Interactive Heatmap: Easily manage your activities with a user-friendly heatmap interface.

1. Left Click: Add a streak by simply clicking on the desired date.
2. Right Click: Subtract from the heatmap to accurately reflect your activity levels.

Dynamic Color Changes: The heatmap changes color based on your activity levels for each day, allowing you to quickly assess your performance at a glance.

Multiple Activities: Customize your tracking experience by adding as many activities as you want. Whether it's exercise, study time, or any other habit, you can keep them all organized in one place.

Privacy-Focused: Your privacy is our priority! We do not save any of your data; everything is collected and stored locally on your device. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your information remains secure and private.

How It Works:

1. Add Activities: Start by inputting the activities you want to track.
2. Engage Daily: Click on the heatmap to add your daily streak or right-click to remove any unwanted entries.
3. Visual Feedback: Watch your heatmap transform as you increase your activity levels, motivating you to stay consistent and achieve your goals!

With the Activity Streak Tracker, you'll gain valuable insights into your habits, making it easier to stay committed and achieve your personal goals. Get started today and make every day count!
